name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, patriotic bloggers have begun to hype that the headless character Lingji Bodhisattva in "Black Myth Wukong" had his head cut off because the head of the real-life prototype Lingji Bodhisattva is in the British Museum.
But in fact, Lingji Bodhisattva is a fictional character in Wu Chengen's novel, so it is not a real Bodhisattva and it is impossible for it to have its own statue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Brother Yang, you are so fragile. I was just refuting a rumor and I didn’t scold you.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/kzRQPkIK6l

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 24, the media reported that the access rights of more than 1,000 IBM R&D and testing employees in Beijing, Shanghai, Dalian and other parts of China were suddenly closed on Friday night, and the employees have been removed from the group. 
The employees are still unclear about the reason, and the latest news is that the layoffs will start on Monday.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Following the case of Evergreen Hotel in Paris, on August 24, blogger Bobo Bushengli released a video saying that there was no Chinese flag among the "flags of all nations" in the Hilton Hotel in Shijiazhuang. He then argued with the hotel, demanding that the hotel immediately remove the flags and criticize and educate the hotel staff.
Netizens revealed that if you look closely, you will find that not only China is not there, but also no countries outside Europe, because the hotel is hanging the flag of last month's European Cup.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the photo of "Black Myth: Wukong" producer Yang Qi raising his middle finger to the statue of Mao Zedong in Tiananmen Square in his early years has been blocked by Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guangxi policeman Li Xie died while trying to save a woman who jumped into the river to commit suicide. Citizens spontaneously went to the scene to offer flowers and bid farewell.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, the B station UP host "Xuanli199" posted a video saying that some WeChat data could not be deleted even with deep cleaning, and the data that could not be deleted became "other data" that could not be cleaned. After analyzing it with a computer, it was found that all chat records were stored in a table. The blogger deleted the chat records five times repeatedly, but in the end, not only were they not cleared, but they were all saved intact.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 24, Wang Ciniu, a peasant woman in Henan who cut off her son's head to petition, passed away. On August 11, a blogger came to the village where Wang Ciniu lived and was told by the villagers that Wang Ciniu had passed away.
In 1991, Wang Ciniu's eldest son was beaten to death by the police and the gold mine owner. She had no way to sue. In desperation, Wang Ciniu cut off her son's head and went to Beijing to petition. In the end, the main culprit, the police and the mine owner, were sentenced to life imprisonment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on August 25, Telegram founder Pavel Durov was arrested in Paris on Saturday night (August 24). TF1 reported that the French police were conducting an investigation and initially believed that he might be related to a case, so they issued an arrest warrant for him. The focus of the investigation is that Telegram lacks moderators who review content. The police believe that this situation has allowed criminal activities to run rampant on Telegram.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
One year anniversary. 
"Foreign investors are indifferent to A-shares today, but tomorrow they will be out of reach"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, many netizens accused the former hostage "Noah Agamani" of going to Japan's Yasukuni Shrine to "worship ghosts" on social platforms. According to the Israeli Embassy in Japan, "Noah Agamani" and his father visited the Meiji Shrine in Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, in Linyi, Shandong, a sanitation worker ran behind a sprinkler truck with a water pipe to sprinkle water. This scene made many netizens feel sorry for the old lady.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 24, Shenyang, Liaoning. The director of the village committee made a real-name report, saying that while the village secretary was under investigation for violating laws and disciplines, he was retaliated against for refusing to complicity in providing false evidence for the village secretary. The district disciplinary committee and other leaders dismissed him from his position as village director on trumped-up charges.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 21, Xuzhou, Jiangsu. A woman suddenly jumped onto the roof of a car, singing and dancing, "Our great China, China, I love you! Down with Japanese imperialism! Down with American imperialism!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Evergreen Group issued a statement to apologize and emphasized that it agrees with the "1992 Consensus" and "opposes Taiwan independence." On Saturday, former UMC Chairman Tsao Hsing-cheng said, "I think it can be understood. When doing business in China, people have to bow their heads under the eaves. As long as the money can be returned to Taiwan to pay taxes, it's fine."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 24 (Release) Binzhou, Shandong. A man reported in his real name that his wife was pregnant before the marriageable age (9 and a half months pregnant). Zhou Wenjun, a local family planning office staff member, came to his home to ask for 200,000 yuan in child support. After the request failed, his wife was forcibly taken to the county hospital by the family planning office to restrict her freedom and was violently beaten. "Zhou Wenjun instructed the doctor to strangle the baby girl to death," the police did not respond after the report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, in Wuhan, Hubei, a sanitation worker was sweeping the roadside when his broom accidentally touched a passerby's foot. He was insulted by two people in the street, and one of the men even wanted to hit him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, netizens discovered that the Japanese stationery brand "hobonichi" displayed "China" and "Taiwan" side by side in a poster posted on an overseas social platform, which aroused dissatisfaction and boycotts from netizens. On the 21st, "hobonichi" issued a statement to apologize and reiterated that Taiwan is an inalienable part of the People's Republic of China. Japan understands and respects the position of the Chinese government and insists on following the position of Article 8 of the Potsdam Declaration.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Zhang Linlin, the former secretary of the Zhengzhou Youth League Committee who had given red codes to depositors, was transferred to the secretary of the Zhengzhou Culture and Tourism Party Group, people went to the Zhengzhou Culture and Tourism Douyin account to "pay tribute" to Secretary Zhang Linlin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, China's Ministry of State Security released the micro-film "Startling Steps". The film tells the story of how the overseas "M country" spy intelligence agency coveted our chip research and development results, lured and subverted the core personnel of our technology companies, attempted to steal key information, and was eventually dealt with by the national security agency in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 21 (Release) The construction of the Kunming Danuo Ark World project has been suspended since August 2022. Owners over 70 years old have moved into the unfinished building built by the bathhouse owner, enduring the wind, sun and rain. One owner said, "So many elderly owners can't wait, wait until they are 90 or 100 years old, can we live to that age?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ValorantEsports @EDG_Edward @VALORANT awesome

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Abuse, detention, vomiting blood, Zhang Enxu tells his personal experience in an Internet addiction treatment center

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 25, the State Council reported the investigation and handling of the "chaos problem of tank trucks transporting edible vegetable oil": the owner of the vehicle was primarily responsible and had been transferred to the public security organs, several others were arrested, and seven companies were given administrative penalties.
At the same time, the State Council said that it had organized a nationwide cleanup and investigation of the entire chain. Judging from the investigations in various places, no other similar problems have been found so far.
(See the picture for the full version)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Jiangxi, a netizen complained on the Jiangxi government platform that the staff of Shangyao Street in Nanchang City asked residents to scan the code to pay 32.76 yuan for housing insurance. In response, Shangyaowan Community said: Payment is voluntary and there is no random charging.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Xining, Qinghai, a man reported under his real name that he had not done a nucleic acid test for 5 days because he was taking care of his sick parents during the epidemic. He was taken to the police station and beaten by the police until he was unconscious and had fractures. The instructor of the police station came to his home many times, hoping to settle the matter privately.
